Text: Can we get some seeders back? We're all stuck at 96.6%

What's with people downloading it and then disconnecting the minute they get their file?

Stop hitting and running!  If you want the shows to be fast for you when you're late one day then do your part and seed for at least an hour after 100%.

I can even see people disconnected the minute they finish... not cool.
thats why i do it when i go to bed and load it onto my phone in the morning!
